name: yab-is-yet-another-builder
description: Does stuff to your js to make it work better, especially with ESM and those stupid relative imports missing the ".js" extension that are emitted by TypeScript. This will watch your build dir and safely add the ".js" extension where appropriate.
author: djfm <fm.de.jouvencel@gmail.com>

scripts.clean: echo 'cleaning old JS generated files...' && rm -Rf js-unstable
scripts.dev: yarn clean-and-transform-unstable && echo "Now using the development version of YAB to watch its own transpiled code." && concurrently --kill-others "yarn transpile-watch" "yarn run-unstable js-unstable" "yarn tdd"
scripts.pre-release: echo assuming "js-unstable" mature for this iteration and moving its contents to "dist" && rm -Rf dist && cp -R js-unstable dist
